content:
# We have successfully harvested 10 units of iron ore, and our inventory now contains:
# - 12 wood
# - 5 coal
# - 5 stone
# - 10 iron ore
# 
# Now that we have both coal and iron ore, we can insert the iron ore into the stone furnace to start smelting it into iron plates.

# Insert iron ore into the furnace
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace_entity, quantity=10)  # Insert all 10 units of iron ore into the furnace

# After inserting the iron ore, we should check the furnace status to ensure it's now smelting.
print(f"Furnace status after inserting iron ore: {furnace_entity.status}")  # Print the status of the furnace after inserting iron ore
print(f"Inventory after inserting iron ore: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Output the current state of the inventory after inserting iron ore
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Check the entities on the map again to see the updated furnace state
